item.title: First Principles
item.description:
I’ve been reading a few round-ups of life advice/principles in toward the end of 2024. There’s usually a lot of good but generic advice there, so I wanted to write something for myself to follow in 2025. I intend this to be a living document I update over time, and reference daily to keep myself aimed in the right direction.

# Action precedes motivation.

[source] [quote]

# You will run out of time and health sooner than you think.

# You can’t hoard life.

Experiences are ephemeral. Your memory of them is mostly fiction. Don’t chase, don’t cling. [source] [quote]

item.title: Gaps
item.description: what you need to do here is loosen up your own mind, it may be best not to make too much of a direct frontal attack on the problem â€” i.e. to sit down and try to think of ideas. The best plan may be just to keep a background process running, looking for things that seem to be missing. Work on hard problems, driven mainly by curiosity, but have a second self watching over your shoulder, taking note of gaps and anomalies.
